short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LivingMetrics Sales Process Automation tracks emails, provides notifications on site visits, enables calls from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LivingMetrics is a Chrome extension that provides Gmail tracking and is an outbound sales dialer. Combining this Chrome extension with a Living Metrics account will enable you to make sales calls directly from your browser.
